title: BRIEF-EVRY signs 4-year contract with Infratek
text:
BRIEF-EVRY signs 4-year contract with Infratek Sept 9 
Sept 9 EVRY ASA : 
* Infratek selects EVRY 
* Agreement runs for four years and value is estimated at about 50 million Swedish crowns ($5.93 million) 
Source text for Eikon: 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 8.4282 Swedish crowns) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
